channel.title: Stockwatch - Key Events
channel.description: Real-time corporate announcements, deals, and financial results.

item.title: [OCTAWARE] Shahnawaz Aijazuddin Shaikh Sells 14,177 Shares of Octaware Technologies Ltd via Off-market Transaction
item.description:
On January 14, 2026, Shahnawaz Aijazuddin Shaikh sold 14,177 shares of Octaware Technologies Ltd through an off-market transaction. The total equity share capital of the company remains at Rs. 3,59,05,700/- divided into 35,90,570 equity shares of Rs.10/- each, both before and after the transaction. The total diluted share/voting capital of the company also remains unchanged at Rs. 3,59,05,700/- divided into 35,90,570 equity shares of Rs.10/- each after the transaction.

  • Shahnawaz Aijazuddin Shaikh sold 14,177 shares of Octaware Technologies Ltd on January 14, 2026.
  • The sale was executed through an off-market transaction.
  • The total equity share capital of the company remains at Rs. 3,59,05,700/- divided into 35,90,570 equity shares of Rs.10/- each.
  • The total diluted share/voting capital of the company remains unchanged at Rs. 3,59,05,700/- divided into 35,90,570 equity shares of Rs.10/- each after the transaction.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Octaware Technologies Ltd | Category: Transmission of Shares

item.title: [GCSL] Gretex Corporate Services Ltd Files DRHP for Amazin Automation Solutions India Limited on NSE Emerge
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Gretex Corporate Services Ltd has announced that it has filed the Draft Red Herring Prospectus (DRHP) of Amazin Automation Solutions India Limited with the Emerge Platform of the National Stock Exchange Limited (NSE Emerge). This announcement was made by Bhavna Desai, Company Secretary & Compliance Officer of Gretex Corporate Services Ltd.

  • Gretex Corporate Services Ltd has filed the DRHP of Amazin Automation Solutions India Limited with the Emerge Platform of NSE Ltd.
  • The announcement was made by Bhavna Desai, Company Secretary & Compliance Officer of Gretex Corporate Services Ltd.

Company: Gretex Corporate Services Ltd | Category: New Launch

item.title: [USHAMART] Usha Martin Ltd Assigned ESG Rating of '69' by CFC Finlease for FY 2024-25
item.description:
Usha Martin Ltd has been voluntarily assigned an ESG rating of '69' by CFC Finlease Private Limited, a SEBI registered ESG Rating Provider. The rating is based on the information/data of the Company pertaining to financial year 2024-25 available in the public domain. The Company did not engage CFC Finlease Private Limited for ESG rating and the rating was done independently. This disclosure is also being made available on the Company's website i.e. www.ushamartin.com.

  • Usha Martin Ltd assigned ESG rating of '69' by CFC Finlease
  • Rating based on FY 2024-25 public domain data
  • Company did not engage CFC Finlease for ESG rating
  • Rating done independently by CFC Finlease
  • Disclosure made available on the Company's website

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: USHA MARTIN LTD. | Category: Rating

item.title: [RCF] Rashtriya Chemicals and Fertilizers Ltd Granted Patent for Fertilizer Coating System
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Rashtriya Chemicals and Fertilizers Ltd has been granted a patent for an invention titled 'A System and A Process for Coating A Fertilizer' by The Patent Office, Government of India. The patent, numbered 578371, was officially granted on January 16, 2026, for a term of 20 years from March 19, 2024, in accordance with the Indian Patents Act, 1970. This achievement is a significant milestone for the company, demonstrating its commitment to innovation and technological advancement in the fertilizer industry.

  • Rashtriya Chemicals and Fertilizers Ltd has been granted a patent for a fertilizer coating system.
  • The patent, numbered 578371, was officially granted on January 16, 2026.
  • The patent term is 20 years from March 19, 2024, in accordance with the Indian Patents Act, 1970.
  • This achievement highlights the company's commitment to innovation and technological advancement.
  • The patent is a significant milestone for the company in the fertilizer industry.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: RASHTRIYA CHEMICALS & FERTILIZERS LTD. | Category: Deals

item.title: [PARSVNATH] Edelweiss ARC Acquires 2.04% Stake in Parsvnath Developers Limited via Open Market
item.description:
Edelweiss Asset Reconstruction Company Limited (Edelweiss ARC) has acquired 2.04% stake in Parsvnath Developers Limited. The acquisition was made through the open market between July 21, 2025, and December 29, 2025. Edelweiss ARC purchased a total of 87,04,215 shares, which were previously held encumbered, but have now been released by the acquirer. The total diluted share/voting capital of Parsvnath Developers Limited after the acquisition stands at 5.26%.

  • Edelweiss ARC acquires 2.04% stake in Parsvnath Developers Limited
  • Acquisition made through the open market between July 21, 2025, and December 29, 2025
  • Edelweiss ARC purchased 87,04,215 shares from the open market
  • Shares previously held encumbered but have now been released by the acquirer
  • Total diluted share/voting capital of Parsvnath Developers Limited after the acquisition stands at 5.26%

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: PARSVNATH DEVELOPERS LTD. | Category: Investment

item.title: [VIRTUALG] Aryadeep Tie Up Pvt Ltd Acquires 2,37,50,000 Shares of Virtual Global Education Ltd
item.description:
Aryadeep Tie Up Pvt Ltd has disclosed the acquisition of 2,37,50,000 Equity Shares of Virtual Global Education Ltd. This represents 5.31% of the total paid-up equity share capital of the company. The acquisition was made by way of preferential allotment of warrants convertible to Equity. The warrants have a face value of Rs. 1/- each and can be converted into 1 Equity Share per warrant on receipt of amount at the rate of Rs. 1/- per warrant.

  • Aryadeep Tie Up Pvt Ltd acquires 2,37,50,000 Equity Shares of Virtual Global Education Ltd
  • The acquisition represents 5.31% of the total paid-up equity share capital
  • The acquisition was made by way of preferential allotment of warrants convertible to Equity
  • The warrants have a face value of Rs. 1/- each
  • The warrants can be converted into 1 Equity Share per warrant on receipt of amount at the rate of Rs. 1/- per warrant

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: VIRTUAL GLOBAL EDUCATION LTD. | Category: Acquisitions

item.title: [DAVANGERE] Arihant Capital Markets Acquires 2.62% Stake in Davangere Sugar Company Ltd via Open Market
item.description:
Arihant Capital Markets Ltd has acquired a 2.62% stake in Davangere Sugar Company Ltd through the open market. The acquisition took place on 16th January 2026, with Arihant Capital Markets purchasing 37,567,109 shares carrying voting rights. The total equity shares capital of Davangere Sugar Company Ltd stands at 1,42,99,90,798 Equity Shares of Rs. 1/- each, both before and after the acquisition. The total diluted share/voting capital of the company also remains the same at 1,42,99,90,798 Equity Shares of Rs. 1/- each.

  • Arihant Capital Markets acquires 2.62% stake in Davangere Sugar Company Ltd
  • The acquisition was done through the open market
  • 37,567,109 shares carrying voting rights were purchased
  • The acquisition took place on 16th January 2026
  • The total equity shares capital of Davangere Sugar Company Ltd remains unchanged at 1,42,99,90,798 Equity Shares of Rs. 1/- each

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Davangere Sugar Company Ltd | Category: Acquisitions

item.title: [ALKEM] ICICI Prudential Mutual Fund Reduces Stake in Alkem Laboratories Ltd by 2.1%
item.description:
ICICI Prudential Mutual Fund has sold 2,42,508 shares of Alkem Laboratories Ltd, decreasing its shareholding by more than 2%. This is a net sale from the last filing submitted on June 05, 2025, where the Fund held 5.22%. The Fund's holding is from an investment perspective and not with the objective of seeking any controlling interest.

  • ICICI Prudential Mutual Fund sells 2,42,508 shares of Alkem Laboratories Ltd.
  • The sale results in a decrease of more than 2% in the Fund's shareholding.
  • The sale is a net sale from the last filing submitted on June 05, 2025.
  • The Fund's holding is from an investment perspective.
  • Alkem Laboratories Ltd shares are listed on BSE Limited and National Stock Exchange of India.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: Alkem Laboratories Ltd | Category: Transmission of Shares

item.title: [SEAMECLTD] Seamec Ltd's Vessel 'SEAMEC AGASTYA' Returns to Field After Technical Redressal
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Seamec Ltd has announced the return of its vessel 'SEAMEC AGASTYA' to the field following technical redressal. The vessel was off-hire and undergoing repairs, but it has now resumed operations as of 16 January 2026 at 22:00 hours.

  • Seamec Ltd's vessel 'SEAMEC AGASTYA' has returned to the field after technical redressal.
  • The vessel was off-hire and undergoing repairs.
  • It has resumed operations as of 16 January 2026 at 22:00 hours.
  • The return of the vessel to operations is a significant development for Seamec Ltd.

ðŸ“„ Read Official Filing (PDF)


Company: SEAMEC LTD. | Category: Deals

item.title: [SEAMECLTD] Seamec Ltd's Vessel 'SEAMEC AGASTYA' Returns to Field After Technical Redressal
item.description:
ðŸ”¥ Trending

Seamec Ltd has informed about the deployment status of its vessel 'SEAMEC AGASTYA'. Following technical redressal, the vessel has returned to the field and has been on hire since 16 January 2026, 22:00 hours. The information was received on 17 January 2026, at 00:27 hours.

  • Seamec Ltd's vessel 'SEAMEC AGASTYA' has returned to the field after technical redressal.
  • The vessel has been on hire since 16 January 2026, 22:00 hours.

Company: SEAMEC LTD. | Category: Deals
